macro.name: Build
macro.text: `========================== C_TEXT($projectPath_t;$projectFile_t) $projectPath_t:=Get 4D folder(Database Folder )+"Preferences"+Folder separator+"BuildApp"+Folder separator $projectFile_t:="BuildApp.xml" BUILD APPLICATION($projectPath_t+$projectFile_t) If (OK=1) ALERT("Build complete!") Else ALERT("Build failed!") End if `==========================

macro.name: 00_Start
macro.text: // this method opens a window in its own unique process C_LONGINT($1) C_LONGINT($pss;$Ref) Case of : (Count parameters=0) $pss:=New process(Current method name;1024*1024;Current method name;Red;*) BRING TO FRONT($pss) Else $Ref:=Open form window("";Plain form window;Horizontally Centered;Vertically Centered) DIALOG() CLOSE WINDOW End case

macro.name: M_Process
macro.text: c_longint($stack;$PID) c_text($methodName;$processName) $stack:=1024*1024 $methodName:= $processName:=$methodName+" process" $PID:=new process($methodName;$stack;$processName;*) Bring to front($PID)

macro.name: P_Dialog
macro.text: c_longint($winRef) $winRef:=Open Form Window(;standard form window;horizontally centered;vertically centered) DIALOG() close window($winRef)
